docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 3. --Four Finance Ministers of South America closed their eight-day conference here today by recommending that immediate steps be taken for reducing tariffs and abolishing embargoes and "other trade restrictions." They...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 3. --Four Finance Ministers of South America closed their eight-day conference here today by recommending that immediate steps be taken for reducing tariffs and abolishing embargoes and "other trade restrictions." They strongly recommended at the same time immediate measures for moving their currencies back toward the par rate of exchange.
